name: DeepChannel WebApp
description: A web application for applying deep learning models to ion channel patch clamp data.
problem: Drugs targeting ion channels account for around 1 in 7 pharmacuticals, however their development is hindered by a lack of efficient data analysis methods.
solution: This project aims to provide a user-friendly interface for researchers to analyze their data using state-of-the-art deep learning models.
facts: 99% per-point accuracy of time series segmentation
